text:
="preserve">Mary Wickes (originally Wickenhauser; June 3, 1910 – October 22, 1995) was an American actress. She first performed on Broadway in "The Farmer Takes a Wife". She also acted as Nurse Preen in "The Man Who Came to Dinner".
Wickes was also a comedian.
Mary Wickes was born in St. Louis, Missouri. She died in Los Angeles as a result of surgical complications.
